title: Donald Trump formally arrested after arriving at New York courthouse
description: Donald Trump has been formally arrested following his arrival at a New York courthouse where he will become the first former US president to face criminal charges.

title: Woman, 26, charged over explosion that killed pro-war blogger in Russia
description: A 26-year-old woman has been charged after a deadly explosion at a cafe in St Petersburg.

title: TikTok fined £12.7m for data protection breaches
description: TikTok has been fined £12.7m for breaches of data protection law, including using the personal data of children aged under 13 without parental consent.

title: Finland officially joins NATO, as Russia threatens 'counter measures'
description: Finland has officially become a member of NATO after concerns over Russia's aggression.

title: New Zealand PM stumbles when asked to define 'woman'
description: New Zealand's new prime minister was left struggling for words at a news conference after a reporter asked him to define the term "woman".

title: ISIS leader who planned attacks on Europe killed in Syria by US strike
description: A senior Islamic state leader who was responsible for planning ISIS attacks into Europe has been killed in Syria by the United States.

title: Richard Branson's satellite launching firm Virgin Orbit files for bankruptcy protection
description: Virgin Orbit has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the US after failing to secure the funding needed to recover from a January rocket failure.

title: Richard Branson's satellite launching firm Virgin Orbit files for bankruptcy protection
description: Virgin Orbit has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the US after failing to secure the funding needed to recover from a January rocket failure.

title: One dead and 30 injured after passenger train derails in the Netherlands
description: One person has died and dozens have been injured after a passenger train derailed in the south of the Netherlands, the Dutch emergency services said.
